article.title: Northrop to Upgrade Hawkeye Technology
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corp., Integrated Systems, Bethpage, N.Y., is being awarded a $34,263,096 firm-fixed-price delivery order against a previously issued basic order agreement for obsolescent component redesign for the mission computer and displays, integrated navigation and control display system, and network file system systems in support of the E-2D Advanced Hawkeye aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
